Articles.Content:
Hi all, I'm boyercam and I'm not actually new here. I joined in 2012 when version 0.14.4 was out. I was online for around a year before getting distracted, probably with building a linux distro, and so left the forums. Now I'm back for beta and so I wanted to say hello again.

I have no idea how long I'll remain active here.

Hi there,

Boy are you in for a treat!

The game is full of new parts and gameplay mechanics while still retaining the fun aspect of launching and marveling at the success or laughing at the spectacular failures that ensue.

You could read the change logs but I'd recommend jump straight into it. Get comfortable with parts in the familiar sandbox mode so you can use them effectively in career mode.

Most of all, have fun!

Welcome back!!
Thanks for the welcome iFlyAllTheTime. It's great to see that KSP has kept the fun aspect of the game. I don't think I need to read the changelogs as I have been playing KSP, just not active here

...I don't think I need to read the changelogs as I have been playing KSP, just not active here

Ha, wrong assumption on my part.

Hope you had a good week and have an even better weekend!
Thanks all, and don't worry iFly (I often abbreviate usernames) you're probably not the only one to think that
Welcome back, even if I wasn't there when you left.
